name: ChatGPT-Next-Web
description: A cross-platform ChatGPT web UI with PWA support, optimized for conversation, Prompt Library, and plugins. Based on Vercel.

content.overview: ChatGPT-Next-Web is a sophisticated, cross-platform web user interface for ChatGPT. Built on Vercel, it offers Progressive Web App (PWA) capabilities, allowing users to install it as a native app on various devices. The interface is specifically optimized for conversation experiences, featuring a Prompt Library for efficient interaction and plugin support for extended functionality.

faqs.question: Do I need an OpenAI API key to use ChatGPT-Next-Web?
faqs.answer: Yes, you'll need to provide your own OpenAI API key to use the application. This ensures you have control over your usage and billing.

faqs.question: How do I deploy ChatGPT-Next-Web?
faqs.answer: The easiest way is to deploy directly on Vercel using the one-click deployment option from the GitHub repository. You can also self-host it on your own server.

faqs.question: Is my conversation data private?
faqs.answer: Your conversations are processed through OpenAI's API using your personal API key. The application itself doesn't store your conversation data on any central server beyond what's necessary for functionality.

faqs.question: Can I use it on my phone?
faqs.answer: Yes, as a Progressive Web App (PWA), you can install it on both Android and iOS devices from a compatible browser and use it like a native application.
